list_definition.definition: the power or right to do something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He gave me authority to act on his behalf.

list_definition.definition: a person who is an expert, or a book that can be referred to, on a particular subject

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is an authority on Roman history.

list_definition.definition: the person or people who have power in an administration etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The authorities would not allow public meetings.

list_definition.definition: a natural quality in a person which makes him able to control and influence people
